description: Vertical stroke, broken by a circle with a dot in it

features.description: How round is the central circle? 0 = round, 1 = angular, 2 = mixed or indeterminate
Where is the circle located? 0 = top, 1 = middle, 2 = bottom, 3 = indeterminate
How is the circle decorated? 0 = dot, 1 = hatches, nothing
